import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Modal.css'; export default class ProductDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.initialState = { ProductName: '', CategoryId: '', SkuId: '', Price: '', }; this.state = this.initialState; } componentDidMount() {} onClose = (e) => { this.props.handleClose && this.props.handleClose(e); }; render() { if (!this.props.showProductDetails) { return null; } return (

Product Details
); } }
